content: *this great hat provides great protection against the summer sun featured in july 2009 bk4k by kids for kids lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 90263ad corrections applied sep 1 2009 published in by kids for kids skill level easy level 2 recycled cotton article #482 2 colors 1 ball each *sunshine & pebble beach* crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm split ring stitch markers hat is worked from the top down work band in contrast color and sew onto hat to finish *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns *
